UniProt Entry.description: The amino acid sequence of the current peptide coincides with the amino acid sequence of the UniProt entry.

Literature.Title: The cationic tetradecapeptide mastoparan as a privileged structure for drug discovery: Enhanced antimicrobial properties of mitoparan analogues modified at position-14.
Literature.Author: Howl J, Howl L, Jones S

Sequence Information.Hemolytic Activity: Human embryonic kidney HEK293 cells:50% Cytotoxicity=16.7-19.7 µg/ml,Human embryonic kidney HEK293 cells:96.9-99.9% Cytotoxicity=32 µg/ml
Sequence Information.Target Organism: Staphylococcus aureus(MIC=6.67±1.33µg/ml),Escherichia coli(MIC=4.0±0.0µg/ml),Klebsiella pneumoniae(MIC=26.67±5.33µg/ml),Pseudomonas aeruginosa(MIC=>32µg/ml),Pseudomonas aeruginosa(70-80% Inhibition=32µg/ml),Candida albicans(MIC=13.33±2.67µg/ml),Cryptococcus neoformans(MIC=1.33±0.33µg/ml)
